text: William Donald "Don" Payne (May 5, 1964 - March 26, 2013) was an American writer and producer. He wrote several episodes of The Simpsons after 2000, many of these with John Frink. He met Frink at the University of California, Los Angeles. He also wrote the movies My Super Ex-Girlfriend (2006), Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer (2007), Thor (2011) and Thor: The Dark World (2013). He was born in Wilmington, North Carolina. Payne died from bone cancer on March 26, 2013 at his home in Los Angeles, California. He was 48 years old. He was outlived by his wife and children. ==Notes== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American screenwriters Category:American television writers Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Deaths from bone cancer Category:Writers from North Carolina Category:People from Wilmington, North Carolina
title: Don Payne (writer)
